overview:
Experienced UX specialist, product manager, marketing & sales manager, and business strategist with over 15 years of hands on and managerial experience.

Founded and managed several services companies in the Israeli Internet arena (inc. Netica, Tribal DDB Israel, and others), and currently founding a new startup in Genesis Partners’ technology incubator, The Junction.

Serves as a consultant in 2CENTS.co.il, consulting on Product Marketing, User Experience, Branding, Marcom, etc. to 2CENTS’ clients.

Managed the Visual Communications Design Dept. at HIT - Holon Institute of Technology, till Aug. 2011.

Founded and managed the Interactive Design Program in Shenkar College from 2000-2007.

Consultant at the Israel higher education committee for design programs.

VP and founder of Israel Community of Designers (local chapter of ICOGRADA and ICSID).
